birthplace: Rough Lane, Shirley Common, Ashbourne, Derbyshire
overview:
Ivet is a company which provides different veterinanry products for pet owners. The company is located at Rough Lane, Shirley Common, Ashbourne, Derbyshire, United Kingdom. Ivet is oe of the Internet companies which render services from qualified veterinary surgeons onboard for their customers, giving them the assurance that they will only provide the right prescription for their pets. The company offers products from reputable companies, which they have personally tested and proven. Ivet is consists of a dedicated team including pharmacologist, pharmacist and two veterinary surgeons who oversees sales and provide the free, practical advice for pet’s condition through online information sheets.

For further questions and information about Ivet company, feel free to contact them. Their online store is also available for pet owners who are looking for the right veterinary medicine.
